- [Name of Institution]
Undergraduate Researcher
Nov 2023 - May 2024
Goal: To contribute to a deeper understanding of how cost of living influences consumer behavior and build on prior research, on:
- Sentiment Analysis: Fine tuning a pre-trained model and/or training a RNN, with Tensorflow to capture both long range dependencies and LSTM
- Also may fine-tune models with data specific to HCOL/LCOL to provide actionable insights for businesses and researchers by quantifying regional disparities in consumer sentiment.

- Software Engineering Intern

Drake Software Systems
Remote
- Implemented automated deployment processes using Django, resulting in a 20% improvement in data retrieval efficiency.
- Developed and optimized RESTful APIs, including the Github API, to curate a comprehensive and up-to-date list of open source alternatives to enhance user experience.
- Drafted technical documentation, including design docs and workflow guides, for improved project clarity.
